import React from 'react' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; function Navbar(props) { const setItemAndDisplayPopup = (event) => { const popupName = event.currentTarget.getAttribute('popup-name') if (popupName === "view") { const itemString = event.currentTarget.getAttribute('data-item') const item = JSON.parse(itemString); setNode(prevItem => ({ ...prevItem, key: item.key, value: item.value })) } }; const [node, setNode] = useState({key:"", value:""}); return (
{props.page}
Modal title
setNode(prevItem => ({ ...prevItem, key: e.target.value }))} placeholder="key" /> setNode(prevItem => ({ ...prevItem, value: e.target.value }))} placeholder="value" />
) } export default Navbar
